text: @realDonaldTrump And then you played golf and had rallies for and let Europe in for 6 https://t.co/APzEBoWiAC WAS SILENT. @LindseyGrahamSC @markmeadows @gopleader @chuckgrassley @presssec @senatemajldr @SecAzar @VP @Cabinet Wonder how many lives could have been saved. https://t.co/hnrHjZcImP
